title: OPEC Secretary General holds a bilateral meeting with India’s Minister for Petroleum and Natural Gas
description: Vienna, Austria, 3 June 2020--HE Mohammad Sanusi Barkindo, OPEC Secretary General, held a bilateral meeting with HE Dharmendra Pradhan, India’s Minister for Petroleum and Natural Gas, via videoconference to discuss the importance of the OPEC-India partnership and further ways to strengthen dialogue in the face of current challenges.
